Package com.hoodiecoder.enchantmentcore

Class EnchantmentGenerator

java.lang.Object
com.hoodiecoder.enchantmentcore.EnchantmentGenerator
public class EnchantmentGenerator extends Object

Represents a fully functional Minecraft enchantment generator.

Contains methods that generate enchantments, including all custom enchantments and more customizable features.

  • Method Details

    • getOffers

      public List<EnchantmentInformation> getOffers​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, org.bukkit.entity.Player enchanter, int bonus, double amountMultiplier, boolean allowMulti, boolean allowTreasure, boolean axesAsWeapons)
      Gets list of enchantment offers based on different generator parameters and settings.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to get the offers for
      enchanter - The player enchanting the item
      bonus - The bonus enchantment number from bookshelves
      amountMultiplier - The multiplier affecting probability of gaining multiple enchantments
      allowMulti - Indicates multiple enchantments are allowed in offer
      allowTreasure - Indicates treasure enchantments are allowed in offer
      axesAsWeapons - Indicates axes can be treated as weapons
      Returns:
      List of enchantment offers for given parameters

    • getLootOffer

      public EnchantmentInformation getLootOffer​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, org.bukkit.loot.LootTable table, int enchAmount, boolean uniform)
      Gets enchantment information for a given item in a loot table, given different generator parameters and settings.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to get the offers for
      table - The loot table to generate for
      enchAmount - Amount of enchantments to get
      uniform - Whether the offers are uniformly generated
      Returns:
      Loot offer for the given parameters

    • generateOffer

      public EnchantmentInformation generateOffer​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, int baseLevel, int xpSeed, int enchAmount, double amountMultiplier, boolean allowMultiple, boolean allowTreasure, boolean axesAsWeapons)

      Generates a single enchantment offer based on different generator parameters and settings.

      enchAmount specifies a set number of enchantments to generate. Therefore, amountMultiplier, which affects the random chance of getting more enchantments, only has an effect when enchAmount <= 0.

      Parameters:
      item - The item to get the offer for
      baseLevel - The base enchantment level for the offer
      xpSeed - Number that defines the seed of the enchantment
      enchAmount - The number of enchantments to generate
      amountMultiplier - Multiplier that changes the random chance of generating more enchantments
      allowMultiple - Indicates multiple enchantments are allowed in offer
      allowTreasure - Indicates treasure enchantments are allowed in offer
      axesAsWeapons - Indicates axes can be treated as weapons
      Returns:
      A single enchantment offer for the given parameters

    • generateEnchantability

      public int generateEnchantability​(org.bukkit.Material mat)

      Gets enchantability numbers for a given material.

      Enchantability represents how "enchantable" a material is. Higher enchantability means it is more likely to have more enchantments and higher enchantment powers.

      Parameters:
      mat - The material to retrieve enchantability for
      Returns:
      The enchantability of the specified material

    • generatePossibilities

      public Map<org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment,​Integer> generatePossibilities​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, int level, boolean allowTreasure, boolean axesAsWeapons)
      Generates all possibilities for an item based on enchantment level.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to generate possibilities for
      level - The enchantment level to generate for
      allowTreasure - Indicates treasure enchantments are allowed in possibilities
      axesAsWeapons - Indicates axes can be treated as weapons
      Returns:
      Map containing possibilities for the given parameters

    • generateUniformPossibilities

      public Map<org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment,​Integer> generateUniformPossibilities​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, boolean allowTreasure)
      Generates all possibilities for an item using uniform randomness.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to generate possibilities for
      allowTreasure - Indicates treasure enchantments are allowed in possibilities
      Returns:
      Map containing possibilities for the given parameters

    • getBonusNumber

      public int getBonusNumber​(org.bukkit.block.Block table)
      Gets the bonus number for enchanting based on surrounding bookshelves for the specified enchantment table block.
      Parameters:
      table - Enchantment table block to test
      Returns:
      Bonus number for the specified enchantment table block; returns 0 if the block is not an enchantment table.
